title: Urgent Health Update: Turn off All Blue Light! - America Out Loud News
author: Dr Henry Ealy
description: Looking 4 Healing Radio with Dr. Henry Ealy - In this Looking 4 Healing Radio episode, Dr. H drops a bombshell for everyone... Blue Light. Over the weekend, Dr. H found proof that Blue Light emitting from Computer Screens, SMART Phones, TVs, LED Lights, and other sources activates CRISPR transhumanistic, genetic engineering technology known as Gene Drive. Blue Light is what activates CRISPR tech...in addition to giving you...
